BLED112 ClassÂ¶

Create BLED112 Instance:

BLE = BLED112(com_port=None)
The Robo Class initiates its own instance of BLED112 when initialized.

start():

Activates the connected BLED112 USB Dongle

stop():

Turns off BLED112 USB Dongle
